title: shitt teammates make shitt game
body: the fking riot only will give shitty teammates in bz game, even due with 2 people, u always get feeder teammates or retartred teammates, fk this fking stupid rank system. i dont believe in bad luck or unfortunate. the fking riot just simply won't let people rank up and keep give u shitty players. fk it

replies.body:
ai is not know how to spoken ai don like de feeder in my gaem lel rito shud give me de challenjour teemmete so ais can git carried lel fook rito
fook rito rito is useless betch
i ate fooking rito

(anyone get that reference?)
Rito is matching you not with the heroes you need, but with the heroes you deserve.
